name: Berserker Clans
background: The Gangs of New Eden are various factions of violent and deranged outlaws that wage eternal gang wars on the streets of New Eden. These gangs are joined by mercenaries which are not bound to any particular gang, and which fight for anyone that can provide riches or a worthy cause.

gains.name: Master Sniper Rifle
gains.label: Master Sniper Rifle (30", A2, AP(1), Reliable)

options.label: Master Sniper Rifle (30", A2, AP(1), Reliable)

sections.label: Take one Master Heavy Rifle attachment

options.label: Heavy Pistol (12", A1, AP(1)), Hand Weapon (A2)
Twin Heavy Pistol (12", A2, AP(1)), Knife (A1)

gains.name: Heavy Flamer
gains.label: Heavy Flamer (12", A1, AP(1), Blast(3), Reliable)

options.label: Heavy Flamer (12", A1, AP(1), Blast(3), Reliable)
Plasma-Mod (24", A1, AP(4), Limited), Pistol (12", A1), CCW (A2)
Spike Shooter (18", A1, AP(4), Impale), CCW (A1)

spells.name: Clan Power
spells.effect: Pick up to two friendly units within 12", which get Berserker Boost once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Smash!
spells.effect: Pick one enemy unit within 12", which takes 2 hits with AP(1) and Surge.

spells.name: Berserker Frenzy
spells.effect: Pick up to four enemy units within 18", which friendly units gets AP(+1) when charging against once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Crush!
spells.effect: Pick up to two enemy units within 18", which take 1 hit with Blast(3) each.

spells.name: Forge Protection
spells.effect: Pick up to six friendly units within 12", which get +1 to defense rolls once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: params.thisUnit ? 0 : this.getUnitBaseCostDiff({ quality: 4, defense: 5, tough: 2, rules: ["Tough"] }, { defense: 5 - params.effect.rollModifier.value })

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Destroy!
spells.effect: Pick up to three enemy units within 6", which take 1 hit with AP(2) and Impale each.

specialRules.name: Ignores Cover
specialRules.description: This weapon ignores cover.

specialRules.name: Repel Ambushers
specialRules.description: Enemy units using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model's unit.

specialRules.name: Re-Deployment
specialRules.description: After all other units are deployed (excluding units that were set aside), you may remove up to two friendly units from the table and deploy them again. Players alternate in placing Re-Deployment units, starting with the player that activates next.

specialRules.name: Precision Fighter Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get +1 to hit rolls in melee. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Berserker Boost Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Berserker Boost. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Quick Shot Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Quick Shot. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Ravage
specialRules.description: When it's this model's turn to attack in melee, roll X dice. For each 6+ the target takes one wound.

specialRules.name: Speed Feat Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Speed Feat. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Melee Evasion Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Melee Evasion. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Impale
specialRules.description: Against non-Hero units with Tough(3) or more, this weapon gets Deadly(+3).

specialRules.name: Piercing Assault Mark
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick up to 4 enemy units within 18", which friendly units gets Piercing Assault against once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: Berserker
specialRules.description: When attacking, unmodified results of 6 to hit deal 1 extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9 away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush cant seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Berserker Boost
specialRules.description: If this model has Berserker, it deals extra hits on successful unmodified hit results of 5-6 from Berserker (instead of only on 6).

specialRules.name: Quick
specialRules.description: Moves +2" when using Advance, and +2 when using Rush/Charge.

specialRules.name: Quick Shot
specialRules.description: This model may shoot after using Rush actions.

specialRules.name: Speed Feat
specialRules.description: Once per game, when this unit moves and all its models have this rule, you may use this rule so that they move +3" when using Advance actions and +6" when using Rush/Charge actions.

specialRules.name: Melee Evasion
specialRules.description: Enemies get -1 to hit rolls in melee when attacking units where all models have this rule.

specialRules.name: Deadly
specialRules.description: Assign each wound to one model, and multiply it by X. Hits from Deadly must be resolved first, and these wounds dont carry over to other models if the original target is killed.

specialRules.name: Tough
specialRules.description: This model only rolls to check wound effects once it has taken at least X wounds, and is only Knocked Out on rolls of 5+X or more.

specialRules.name: Piercing Assault
specialRules.description: This model gets AP(+1) when charging.

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Surge
specialRules.description: On unmodified results of 6 to hit, this weapon deals 1 extra hits (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Blast
specialRules.description: Ignores cover, and after resolving other special rules, each hit is multiplied by X, where X is up to as many hits as enemy models in the target unit and within 3 of it. Hits must be split evenly between all enemy units within 3 of any model from the target (defender picks how).
